test.analysis package¶

Submodules¶

test.analysis.fft_pda module¶

test.analysis.test_analyzer module¶

class test.analysis.test_analyzer.PlaceHolderPopup¶

Bases: object

class test.analysis.test_analyzer.TestAnalyzer(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Test class for analysis.analyzer.Analyzer class

TestAnalyzer.test_analyze()¶

Unitary test for the analysis.analyzer.Analyzer.analyze() method . Tests that two tests are running when the analyse is started.

test.analysis.test_pitch_analyzer module¶

class test.analysis.test_pitch_analyzer.TestPitchAnalyzer(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Tests the methods of PitchAnalyzer Class

TestPitchAnalyzer.test_detectPitch(fileName='test/toast.wav', windowDuration=0.015)¶

Tests the return of the analysis.pitch_analyzer.PitchAnalyzer.detectPitch() method. It should return a ndarray containing the estimated pitches.

TestPitchAnalyzer.test_pyaapt(fileName='test/toast.wav', windowDuration=0.015)¶

Unitary tests for the analysis.pitch_analyzer.PitchAnalyzer.yaapt() methode. It should return a PitchObj containing a ndarray named values.

test.analysis.test_pitch_cleaner module¶

class test.analysis.test_pitch_cleaner.TestPitchCleaner(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Tests the methods of the PitchCleaner class

TestPitchCleaner.test_trim()¶

Unitary test for the PitchCleaner.trim() method. This method remove silence at the beginning and end of the detected pitches.

test.analysis.test_pitch_parser module¶

class test.analysis.test_pitch_parser.TestPitchParser(methodName='runTest')¶

Bases: unittest.case.TestCase

Test class for PitchParser

TestPitchParser.test_ToMidi(pitches=[(440, 69), (1318, 88)])¶
params:
  • pitches : list of (Hz pitch, MIDI pitch) couples
description :
testDoFFTs() is the unit test function for analysis.pitch_parser.PitchParser.toMidi() It tests that each detected pitch in the given list is approximate to the closest midi value.
TestPitchParser.test_createScore(pulse=24)¶

unitary test for the PitchParser.createScore method It test that the score object is correctly created and containing the correct Note.

TestPitchParser.test_removeShortNotes()¶

Unitary test for the PitchParser.removeShortNotes method It tests that the notes under min duration are removed or added to the nearest note.

TestPitchParser.test_toNote(midi=[69, 69, 69, 23, 23, 23, 23, 23, 23], sr=22050)¶

Unitary test for the method PitchParser.toNote(). It tests that the correct list of notes is returned within the midi input.

params:
midi(list) -> the midi input used for the test
